movieDescription: Details: Directed: Shankar Bhanu Stars: Tejus Kancherla, Paayal Rajput, Dr V.K. Naresh, Nagineedu, Adityamenon Dialogues: Parashuram Lyrics: Bhaskar Bhatla Editor: Prawin Pudi Choreographer: Ganesh Swamy Executive Producer: Chinna D.O.P: C Ram Prasad Music: Radhan Co-Producer: C V Rao Producer: C Kalyan

movieInfo:
Directed by: Arun Pawar
Starring by: Saptagiri, Roshini Prakash, Ali
Genres: Comedy, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Sapthagiri(Sapthagiri), the son of head constable Shiva prasad(Dr.Shiva prasad) aims to become an actor. But his father wishes to see him an IAS officer. Due to some unexpected turn of events, Sapthagiri becomes a police constable.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Gopi Ganesh Pattabi
Starring by: Satya Dev, Nanditha
Genres: Action
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Utham Kumar(Satyadev) is an intelligent con man, who does high-profile scams by cashing on public beliefs. In that process, he meets Avani (Nanditha Swetha), a dignified and kind-hearted girl and falls in love with her. Moving ahead, Utham crosses paths with a dreaded criminal played by Adithya Menon and fixes a deal for a never before heard scam to settle down in life.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sampath V. Rudra
Starring by: Arjun Mahi, Duvvasi Mohan, Thagubothu Ramesh
Genres: Drama, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Ishtangaa is a Telugu movie starring Arjun Mahi and Tanishq Rajan in prominent roles. The movie also stars Duvvasi Mohan, Thagubothu Ramesh and Madhunandan. It is a drama directed by Sampath V. Rudra with P. Venkateshwer Rao as producer, forming part of the crew.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Anil Srikantam
Starring by: Sumanth, Anju Kurian, Satya Akkala
Genres: Action, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Nishit(Sumanth) is a man who suffers from sleep disorders. Because of this, he becomes a reporter and starts shooting crime scenes. In this process, he misuses the footage and starts earning money. This is also the time when he falls in love with Mahati(Anju Kurian). As time passes by, Nishit shoots a murder case and tries to make use of it for money. But to his bad luck, he gets entangled in an even bigger mess involving a big mafia set up.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Gunasekhar
Written by: Gunasekhar, Gopalakrishna Paruchuri
Starring by: Allu Arjun, Anushka Shetty, Rana Daggubati, Prakash Raj
Genres: Action, Biography, History
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The story of the film is set in the ancient Kakatiya dynasty of Orugallu. The majestic kingdom is ruled by Raja Ganapati Devudu(Krishnam Raju) who does not have any male successors. As time passes by, Ganapathi Devudu’s wife gives birth to a baby girl Rudrama Devi(Anushka). Fearing that his long time enemies from the Devagiri dynasty would attack him after knowing that he has no male successors, the king decides to announce Rudrama Devi as prince Rudra Devudu to his empire. Rudrama Devi grows up like a warrior and keeps her identity under wraps. Twist in the tale arises when the entire Kakatiya dynasty comes to know that the young prince is actually a girl.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sanjeev K. Kumar
Host: Rana Daggubati
Guest: Lakshmi Manchu, Rakul Preet Singh (10th) and Venkatesh Daggubati, Varun Tej (11th)
Genres: Reality-TV
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: No.1 Yaari with Rana Season 2 Episode – 10 (16th Dec 2018) and guest Lakshmi Manchu, Rakul Preet Singh. Episode – 11 (23rd Dec 2018) and Venkatesh Daggubati, Varun Tej.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Murali Krishna Mudidani
Starring by: Naveed, Yamini Bhaskar, Parvateesam
Genres: Action, Comedy
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Courier boy Saleem (Parvateesam) and cab driver Parthu (Naveed) are roommates who lie to their parents about being in Dubai and live in Hyderabad instead. When they come in possession of Desa Rahasyalu, written by an ex-Army major Yakub Khan (Raja Ravindran), they perceive it to be something more than what it is and try to sell it to Pakistan.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Oleh Malamuzh
Written by: Yaroslav Voytseshek
Starring by: Nadiya Dorofeeva, Oleksiy Zavhorodniy, Yevhen Malukha
Genres: Animation, Comedy, Fantasy
Country: Ukraine
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Ruslan, a sideshow actor falls for Mila, a runaway princess. Just as their love starts to blossom, the evil sorcerer Chornomor kidnaps the princess which has Ruslan go on a quest to rescue his true love.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Ezhil
Starring by: Vishnu Vishal, Nikki Galrani, Soori
Genres: Comedy
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Murugan (Vishnu) is the right-hand man of the local MLA Jacket Janakiraman (Robo Shankar). During a mass-marriage function organised by Jacket, 8 grooms and 1 bride out of the 25 couples to be married go missing due to the efforts of Jacket’s arch-enemy, another MLA Maurdhamuthu (Aadukalam Naren). Murugan manages to get 7 grooms and 1 bride back, but 1 groom is still missing. To save Jacket’s reputation, he asks his best friend Sakkarai (Soori) to pretend to marry Pushpa (Reshma Pasupuleti), a local dancer and item girl who is known to everyone in the village, despite being betrothed to Hamsavali. Unfortunately for Sakkarai, a photo showing him marrying Pushpa is published in the tabloids and goes viral on social media, forcing Hamsavali to break her engagement with Sakkarai unless he divorces Pushpa

movieInfo:
Directed by: Dinesh Majji
Starring by: Ajay Babu, Karnika Vashisth, Saketh Varma
Genres: Action, Suspense
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Maaya is an Independent Film made by a team of IIT Kharagpur Students using their best possible resources in a limited budget that they could afford.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Chandra Siddhartha
Starring by: Uday Shankar, Doddanna, Hyper Aadi
Genres: Action, Suspense
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The film revolves around the lives of 6 people and how their journeys are interlinked with each other. How did a prisoner, who is sentenced to death, meet his executioner? How did their journey cross paths with that of an eloped couple? During this crunch time, they also have to take a call on the life and death situation of two other individuals. Answers to these form the rest of the story.

movieInfo:
Directed by: T Guru Prasad
Starring by: Raavan Reddy, Payal Wadhwa, Naresh
Genres: Romance
Country: Inida
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Tarun is a stud and a famous musician during high school days, but arrogant and rude to his classmates except to his best friend, Abhay (Moin). He rejects and insults love proposals of many girls, including Ahaana’s (Payal Wadhwa). Sai (Maurice Sadiche), another classmate of his, seeks to join Tarun’s music band but gets bullied by Tarun and Abhay in front of the class. Few years later, Tarun is a college dropout and works as Janitor with Abhay as an accountant, both in the same company with Sai, as their boss. Sai constantly insults Tarun at the workplace, to take revenge of the embarrassing high school incident. Tarun falls in love with same Ahaana, the girl who he rejected and insulted during school days. Ahaana is now a beautiful, independent girl who refuses to forgive Tarun for what he did to her. Tarun claims himself to be a loser with all the problems. His father (V.K.Naresh), who works in CCTV agency, constantly scolds him and motivates him at the same time.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sanjeev K. Kumar
Host: Rana Daggubati
Guest: Navdeep Kishan, Tamannaah
Genres: Reality-TV
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: No.1 Yaari with Rana Season 2 Episode – 09 (10th Dec 2018) and today guest Navdeep Kishan, Tamannaah.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Anubhav Sinha
Written by: David Benullo, Kanika Dhillon
Starring by: Shah Rukh Khan, Arjun Rampal, Kareena Kapoor
Genres: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: A father is his child’s best superhero. Shekhar, after facing criticism from his son, tries to make him feel happy by creating a game in which the villain is comparatively more powerful than the hero. This is what his son exactly wants. Shekhar even gives his face to the game’s hero, G.One. He however keeps on ignoring the issues in the game, but knows little that the game would turn out to be deadly. Ra.One, the villain, using a device invented by Shekhar’s friend and colleague, Jenny, comes out of the game and starts to search for Lucifer, who is none other than Prateek. The lives of everyone turn upside down, when one small imagination turns out to be something that can’t be imagined. As of now, it’s the responsibility of the game’s hero, G.One, to protect the family, not only from the torment of Ra.One, but also from the very danger of being captured by him.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Andy Serkis
Written by: Callie Kloves, Rudyard Kipling
Starring by: Christian Bale, Cate Blanchett, Benedict Cumberbatch
Genres: Adventure, Drama
Country: UK, USA
Language: English
movieDescription: Mowgli: Legend of the Jungle follows the upbringing of the human child Mowgli (Rohan Chand) by a pack of Indian wolves in the jungles of India. As he learns the often harsh rules of the jungle under the tutelage of a bear named Baloo (Andy Serkis) and a black panther named Bagheera (Christian Bale), Mowgli becomes accepted by the animals of the jungle as one of their own except for the fearsome tiger Shere Khan (Benedict Cumberbatch) and his follower Tabaqui (Tom Hollander). But there may be greater dangers lurking in the jungle as Mowgli comes face to face with his human origins.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Karanam Babji
Starring by: Srikanth, Diksha Panth, Manchu Manoj Kumar
Genres: Action, Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Uma Shankar(Srikanth) is an NRI who wants to do something good for his native village. He comes there and makes a well-known person from his area to contest the elections. But to his bad luck, his candidate loses and this does not go well with Uma Shankar who slaps the winning candidate from the opposition party. This crime of his lands him in jail for one year. After coming out of jail, Uma Shankar decides to take revenge and uses all the possible methods to become an MLA during the upcoming elections.
